definition.text: Trading System is already set up. Let's have a look!

paragraphs.text: The strategy is already deployed. So let's have a look around to understand it!
As you cand see, a Trading System has 2 main offsprings:
Dynamic Indicators: This lets you build On-The-Fly indicators
Trading Strategy: Is where we define parameters, conditions and formulas for our strategy
This tutorial doesn't cover definitions or concepts used in SA. This tutorial is only about how to deploy a strategy!
